sentences.en: He stopped, grabbed his dust - whisk by the whisk - end and raced after the cur.
sentences.cn: 他停住了车, 倒攥着布子,拚命的追着狗打.

sentences.en: In a separate bowl, whisk together the remaining sugar and the yolks.
sentences.cn: 用另外一只碗把剩下的糖和蛋黄搅打均匀。

sentences.en: In a small bowl, whisk together the egg whites and buttermilk.
sentences.cn: 在一小碗中, 混合酸牛奶及蛋白,搅拌均匀.

sentences.en: In another bowl, whisk together sugar, egg, oil and salt.
sentences.cn: 取另一盆, 将砂糖, 鸡蛋, 油和盐打匀.

sentences.en: Just before serving, whisk the cream.
sentences.cn: 在上桌之前，要搅打一下奶油。

sentences.en: There is a tea whisk on the table.
Using a whisk, mix the yolks and sugar to a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 用打蛋器将蛋黄和糖打成均匀的糊状。

sentences.en: Whisk 25g .1 oz. of butter into the sauce.
sentences.cn: 把25克（即1盎司）黄油搅拌到酱汁里。

sentences.en: Whisk the batter with a wire whisk or hand beater until it is smooth and light.
sentences.cn: 用搅打器或手动搅拌器将面糊搅打均匀暄软。

sentences.en: Whisk the cream and fold in the melted chocolate.
sentences.cn: 将乳脂搅拌后与熔化的巧克力拌在一起.

sentences.en: Whisk the cream into the mixture to emulsify it.
sentences.cn: 将奶油搅打到混合物中，使其乳化。

sentences.en: Whisk the egg whites until stiff.
Whisk the egg whites until they are foamy but not stiff.
sentences.cn: 把蛋清搅至起沫而不黏稠的程度。

sentences.en: Whisk the mixture until it is smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把混合物搅拌至均匀细腻。

sentences.en: With a whisk of its tail, it has gone.

trans.tran_cn: 掸，轻抹，扫帚，毛掸子，搅拌器
trans.tran_en: a small kitchen tool made of curved pieces of wire, used for mixing air into eggs, cream etc
to mix liquid, eggs etc very quickly so that air is mixed in, using a fork or a whisk
